action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Justice Safety Valve Act of 2021
This bill authorizes a court to impose a sentence below the mandatory minimum if it determines, after considering certain factors, that the mandatory minimum sentence is greater than necessary.
